SpellModifyFeature.Name: Raven Queen’s Blessing
SpellModifyFeature.Text: When you score a critical hit with your eldritch blast cantrip, pick yourself or an ally you can see within 30 feet of you. The chosen creature can immediately expend a Hit Die to regain hit points equal to the roll + the creature’s Constitution modifier (minimum of 1 hit point).
SpellModifyFeature.Prerequisite: Raven Queen patron, eldritch blast cantrip
